name: Baseline_End
description: End cycle for baseline signal calculation

name: Baseline_Start
description: Start cycle for baseline signal calculation

name: CT
description: Threshold cycle where fluorescence exceeds background

name: Ct_Mean
description: Average CT value from technical replicates

name: Ct_SD
description: Standard deviation of CT values among replicates

name: Ct_Threshold
description: Fluorescence threshold used to calculate CT

name: HIGHSD
description: High standard deviation among technical replicates for a given sample, suggesting inconsistent amplification

name: Reporter
description: Fluorescent dye used to detect amplification

name: Sample_Name
description: Name or ID of the biological or experimental sample

name: Tm1
description: Melting temperature of the first PCR product peak

name: Well
description: Identifies the specific well on the qPCR plate
